name: Kung-Fu Master
overview: Leap into Action! Trouble's brewing under the blistering desert sun. The arch-fiend Daddy Long Legs and his army of Ninja Mercenaries, Kung Phooeys, and other bandits are cooking up something evil in their Pyramid-shaped factories and not telling anyone about it. Bruce Leap, Kung-Fu Master and part-time camel racer, must once again jump into the fry and set things straight. Leap has no need for guns, his hands and feet are themselves lethal weapons.
